cards.name: president
cards.description: You are a primary character. Blue Team wins if you do not gain the "dead" condition.

cards.name: bomber
cards.description: You are a primary character. Everyone in the same room as you at the end of the game gains the "dead" condition.

cards.name: blue team
cards.description: You are on the Blue Team. If the President does not gain the "dead" condition, you win.

cards.name: red team
cards.description: You are on Red Team. If the President gains the "dead" condition, you win.

cards.name: gambler
cards.description: At the end of the final round, before all players reveal their cards, you must publicly announce which team you think won the game. If you are correct, you win.
